bibl.title: Coptic Christology in Practice: Incarnation and Divine Participation in Late Antique and Medieval Egypt. (Oxford Early Christian Studies.)
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 109-197: Part II. Bodies, Practices, and Sacred Space: - 3. Christology in Coptic Pilgrimage and the Cult of the Saints; - 4. Christology and Coptic Art: Images of the Incarnation on Egyptian Bodies and Monuments.
bibl.seg: Davis Stephen J., Coptic Christology in Practice: Incarnation and Divine Participation in Late Antique and Medieval Egypt. (Oxford Early Christian Studies.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2008, 8°, xviii-371 pp., nombr. figg. ISBN 978-0-19-925862-8. £91.

See in part. pp. 109-197: Part II. Bodies, Practices, and Sacred Space: - 3. Christology in Coptic Pilgrimage and the Cult of the Saints; - 4. Christology and Coptic Art: Images of the Incarnation on Egyptian Bodies and Monuments.
